metadata.title: CVE-2022-23134 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: After the initial setup process, some steps of setup.php file are reachablenot only by super-administrators, but by unauthenticated users as well.Malicious actor can pass step checks and potentially change theconfiguration of Zabbix Frontend.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
